dialogue.name: Ripley
dialogue.line: Now let me get this straight. The aliens paralyzed the colonists, carried them over there, cocooned them to be hosts for more of those...

dialogue.name: Ripley
dialogue.line: Which would mean lots of those parasites, right?  One for each person...over a hundred at least.

dialogue.name: Bishop
dialogue.line: Yes.  That follows.

dialogue.name: Ripley
dialogue.line: But these things come from eggs...so where are all the eggs coming from.

dialogue.name: Bishop
dialogue.line: That is the question of the hour.  We could assume a parallel to certain insect forms who have hivelike organization. An ant of termite colony, for example, is ruled by a single female, a queen, which is the source of new eggs.

dialogue.name: Ripley
dialogue.line: You're saying one of those things lays all the eggs?

dialogue.name: Bishop
dialogue.line: Well, the queen is always physically larger then the others.  A termite queen's abdomen is so bloated with eggs that it can't move at all.  It is fed and tended by drone workers, defended by the warriors.  She is the center of their lives, quite literally the  mother of their society.

dialogue.name: Ripley
dialogue.line: Could it be intelligent?

dialogue.name: Bishop
dialogue.line: Hard to say.  It may have been blind instinct...attraction to the heat of whatever...but she did choose to incubate her eggs in the one spot where we couldn't destroy her without destroying ourselves.  That's if she exists, of course.

characters.persona: There are multiple characters in the movie 'Aliens' with the name "Simpson". One of these characters is a corporal in the Weyland-Yutani corporation and is played by Michael Biehn. dialogue.name: Ripley
dialogue.line: Look, I can see where this is going.  But I'm telling you those things exist.  Back on that planetoid is an alien ship and on that ship are thousands of eggs.  Thousands. Do you understand?  I suggest you find it, using the flight recorder's data.  Find it and deal with it -- before one of your survey teams comes back with a little surprise...

dialogue.name: Van leuwen
dialogue.line: Thank you, Officer Ripley.  That will be...

dialogue.name: Ripley
dialogue.line: ...because just one of those things managed to kill my entire crew, within twelve hours of hatching...
